11#ifndef RTC_BASE_LOCATION_H_
12#define RTC_BASE_LOCATION_H_
13
14#include <string>
15
16#include "rtc_base/system/rtc_export.h"
17
18namespace rtc {
19
20// Location provides basic info where of an object was constructed, or was
21// significantly brought to life.
22// This is a stripped down version of:
23// https://code.google.com/p/chromium/codesearch#chromium/src/base/location.h
24class RTC_EXPORT Location {
25 public:
26 // Constructor should be called with a long-lived char*, such as __FILE__.
27 // It assumes the provided value will persist as a global constant, and it
28 // will not make a copy of it.
29 Location(const char* function_name, const char* file_name, int line_number)
30 : function_name_(function_name),
31 file_name_(file_name),
32 line_number_(line_number) {}
33 Location() = default;
34
35 const char* function_name() const { return function_name_; }
36 const char* file_name() const { return file_name_; }
37 int line_number() const { return line_number_; }
38 // TODO(steveanton): Remove once all downstream users have been updated to use
39 // |file_name()| and/or |line_number()|.
40 const char* file_and_line() const { return file_name_; }
41
42 std::string ToString() const;
43
44 private:
45 const char* function_name_ = "Unknown";
46 const char* file_name_ = "Unknown";
47 int line_number_ = -1;
48};
49
50// Define a macro to record the current source location.
51#define RTC_FROM_HERE RTC_FROM_HERE_WITH_FUNCTION(__FUNCTION__)
52
53#define RTC_FROM_HERE_WITH_FUNCTION(function_name) \
54 ::rtc::Location(function_name, __FILE__, __LINE__)
55
56} // namespace rtc
57
58#endif // RTC_BASE_LOCATION_H_
59
